title: Order Roller Replica
paragraphs: This article is about the replica weapon, unlockable for use in versus battles. For the weapon used inside Side Order, see Order Roller.
The Order Roller Replica is a main weapon in Splatoon 3.
The Order Roller Replica is designed to look like a simplified version of the Splat Roller, containing only white and gray colors.
The Order Roller Replica comes with Curling Bombs and Big Bubbler. The Order Roller Replica's stats, sub weapon, and special weapon are identical to those of the Splat Roller.
To unlock the Order Roller Replica, the player must complete Side Order with Callie's Palette.
For competitive tips about the Order Roller Replica
Note: The strategy advice for Splat Roller also applies to Order Roller Replica, because of this, they share the same strategy page.
